name: LIXIL Water Technology Indonesia - POA NFT

metadata.name: The LIXIL Day of Architecture and Design 2022
metadata.description: 'Rain' is a collaborative artwork between LIXIL Water Technology Indonesia, KunKun Visual, and 678Labs, to celebrate LIXIL Day of Architecture and Design 2022. We choose water as the main character for this artwork which represents freshness and life. We know that human life depends on rain and it's also the source of fresh water for many cultures. By owning this artwork as an NFT, we hope attendees will remember and celebrate the beauty of water that nature gives us for our life.
